verses.verse: In the seventh <WH7651> year <WH8141> of Yehu <WH3058> Jehoash <WH3060> began to reign <WH4427> <WH8804>; and forty <WH705> years <WH8141> reigned <WH4427> <WH8804> he in Yerushalayim <WH3389>. And his mother's <WH517> name <WH8034> was Zibiah <WH6645> of Be'er-Sheva <WH884>.

And Jehoash <WH3060> did <WH6213> <WH8799> that which was right <WH3477> in the sight <WH5869> of the YY <WH3068> all his days <WH3117> wherein Y'hoyada <WH3077> the Kohen <WH3548> instructed <WH3384> <WH8689> him.
But the high places <WH1116> were not taken away <WH5493> <WH8804>: the people <WH5971> still sacrificed <WH2076> <WH8764> and burnt incense <WH6999> <WH8764> in the high places <WH1116>.

And Jehoash <WH3060> said <WH559> <WH8799> to the Kohanim <WH3548>, All the money <WH3701> of the dedicated things <WH6944> that is brought <WH935> <WH8714> into the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>, even the money <WH3701> of every one <WH376> that passeht <WH5674> <WH8802> the account, the money <WH3701> that every man <WH5315> is set at <WH6187>, and all the money <WH3701> that cometh <WH5927> <WH8799> into any man's <WH376> heart <WH3820> to bring <WH935> <WH8687> into the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>,

Let the Kohanim <WH3548> take <WH3947> <WH8799> it to them, every man <WH376> of his acquaintance <WH4378>: and let them repair <WH2388> <WH8762> the breaches <WH919> of the house <WH1004>, wheresoever any breach <WH919> shall be found <WH4672> <WH8735>.

But it was so, that in the three <WH7969> <WH8141> and twentieth <WH6242> year <WH8141> of king <WH4428> Jehoash <WH3060> the Kohanim <WH3548> had not repaired <WH2388> <WH8765> the breaches <WH919> of the house <WH1004>.

Then king <WH4428> Jehoash <WH3060> called <WH7121> <WH8799> for Y'hoyada <WH3077> the Kohen <WH3548>, and the other Kohanim <WH3548>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Why repair <WH2388> <WH8764> ye not the breaches <WH919> of the house <WH1004>? now therefore receive <WH3947> <WH8799> no more money <WH3701> of your acquaintance <WH4378>, but deliver <WH5414> <WH8799> it for the breaches <WH919> of the house <WH1004>.

And the Kohanim <WH3548> consented <WH225> <WH8735> to receive <WH3947> <WH8800> no <WH1115> more money <WH3701> of the people <WH5971>, neither <WH1115> to repair <WH2388> <WH8763> the breaches <WH919> of the house <WH1004>.

But Y'hoyada <WH3077> the Kohen <WH3548> took <WH3947> <WH8799> a <WH259> chest <WH727>, and bored <WH5344> <WH8799> a hole <WH2356> in the lid <WH1817> of it, and set <WH5414> <WH8799> it beside <WH681> the altar <WH4196>, on the right side <WH3225> as one <WH376> cometh <WH935> <WH8800> into the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>: and the Kohanim <WH3548> that kept <WH8104> <WH8802> the door <WH5592> put <WH5414> <WH8804> therein all the money <WH3701> that was brought <WH935> <WH8716> into the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>.

And it was so, when they saw <WH7200> <WH8800> that there was much <WH7227> money <WH3701> in the chest <WH727>, that the king's <WH4428> scribe <WH5608> <WH8802> and the high <WH1419> Kohen <WH3548> came up <WH5927> <WH8799>, and they put up in bags <WH6696> <WH8799>, and told <WH4487> <WH8799> the money <WH3701> that was found <WH4672> <WH8737> in the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>.

And they gave <WH5414> <WH8804> the money <WH3701>, being told <WH8505> <WH8794>, into the hands <WH3027> of them that did <WH6213> <WH8802> the work <WH4399>, that had the oversight <WH6485> <WH8716> <WH8675> <WH6485> <WH8803> of the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>: and they laid it out <WH3318> <WH8686> to the carpenters <WH2796> <WH6086> and builders <WH1129> <WH8802>, that wrought <WH6213> <WH8802> upon the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>,

And to masons <WH1443> <WH8802>, and hewers <WH2672> <WH8802> of stone <WH68>, and to buy <WH7069> <WH8800> timber <WH6086> and hewed <WH4274> stone <WH68> to repair <WH2388> <WH8763> the breaches <WH919> of the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>, and for all that was laid out <WH3318> <WH8799> for the house <WH1004> to repair <WH2394> it.

Howbeit there were not made <WH6213> <WH8735> for the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068> bowls <WH5592> of silver <WH3701>, snuffers <WH4212>, basons <WH4219>, shofars <WH2689>, any vessels <WH3627> of gold <WH2091>, or vessels <WH3627> of silver <WH3701>, of the money <WH3701> that was brought <WH935> <WH8716> into the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>:
But they gave <WH5414> <WH8799> that to the workmen <WH4399> <WH6213> <WH8802>, and repaired <WH2388> <WH8765> therewith the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>.

Moreover they reckoned <WH2803> <WH8762> not with the men <WH582>, into whose hand <WH3027> they delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> the money <WH3701> to be bestowed <WH5414> <WH8800> on workmen <WH4399>: for they dealt <WH6213> <WH8802> faithfully <WH530>.
The trespass <WH817> money <WH3701> and sin <WH2403> money <WH3701> was not brought <WH935> <WH8714> into the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>: it was the Kohanim <WH3548> '.

Then Hazael <WH2371> king <WH4428> of Syria <WH758> went up <WH5927> <WH8799>, and fought <WH3898> <WH8735> against Gat <WH1661>, and took <WH3920> <WH8799> it: and Hazael <WH2371> set <WH7760> <WH8799> his face <WH6440> to go up <WH5927> <WH8800> to Yerushalayim <WH3389>.

And Jehoash <WH3060> king <WH4428> of Y'hudah <WH3063> took <WH3947> <WH8799> all the hallowed things <WH6944> that Y'hoshafat <WH3092>, and Yoram <WH3088>, and Ahaziah <WH274>, his fathers <WH1>, kings <WH4428> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, had dedicated <WH6942> <WH8689>, and his own hallowed things <WH6944>, and all the gold <WH2091> that was found <WH4672> <WH8737> in the treasures <WH214> of the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>, and in the king's <WH4428> house <WH1004>, and sent <WH7971> <WH8799> it to Hazael <WH2371> king <WH4428> of Syria <WH758>: and he went away <WH5927> <WH8799> from Yerushalayim <WH3389>.

And the rest <WH3499> of the acts <WH1697> of Yo'ash <WH3101>, and all that he did <WH6213> <WH8804>, are they not written <WH3789> <WH8803> in the book <WH5612> of the chronicles <WH1697> <WH3117> of the kings <WH4428> of Y'hudah <WH3063> ?

And his servants <WH5650> arose <WH6965> <WH8799>, and made <WH7194> <WH8799> a conspiracy <WH7195>, and slew <WH5221> <WH8686> Yo'ash <WH3101> in the house <WH1004> of Millo <WH4407> <WH8677> <WH1037>, which goeth down <WH3381> <WH8802> to Silla <WH5538>.

For Jozachar <WH3108> the son <WH1121> of Shimeath <WH8100>, and Jehozabad <WH3075> the son <WH1121> of Shomer <WH7763>, his servants <WH5650>, smote <WH5221> <WH8689> him, and he died <WH4191> <WH8799>; and they buried <WH6912> <WH8799> him with his fathers <WH1> in the city <WH5892> of David <WH1732>: and Amaziah <WH558> his son <WH1121> reigned <WH4427> <WH8799> in his stead.
